about_the_game:
CHANGE YOUR CITY FROM GHETTO TO PARADISE !

At Startup click on the Flag for that language.

The video game where you play as an Angel. Your mission is to transform this city ghetto into a lovely looking paradise, But, how can you make this happen, you ask? You must confront the existing spirit power there and defeat him. Presently, he rules this city with drug cartels, cocaine lords and much more. You must defeat the one who controls these city structures inside the boxing ring at the Roman Colosseum.



Capture the enemy buildings and gain fight moves by winning boxing bouts.

After clicking on an invitation icon in the city and watching an event taking place. The Angel will then announce his idea for that event's ending. The demon angel, in contrast, will then answer his idea for that same events ending. The winner of the boxing fight will determine the actual ending.

As you start to win fights, it will be noticed that the graffiti and trash in the city will start to disappear. Your enemy will also start to acknowledge you are winning and therefore speed up his attacks on you in the arena. Eventually, the hard core crimes happening in the city will start to be lesser tone in spectrum.

Instead of violence occurring, then the events taking place will begin to be non-violent.

Which one will win? Are You up to the task? Save your people in the city!

PLAY THE GAME - NOW !!!

content_descriptors.notes: Please be aware that If the Angel player loses in the arena, then various criminal or other negative instances can and will be shown.  This includes scenes of alcohol abuse, suicide, sexual and / or criminal assaults, accidents, hallucinations of monsters, revenge killings, gang violence, vandalism, space alien abductions and other mischievous behavior.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: El Capitan 10.11
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: The Battle of Angels

subs.option_text: The Battle of Angels - Commercial License - $4.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP
  • Processor: 1.1 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 2.1 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The game where you play as an Angel. After watching an event taking place. The Angel will then announce his idea for that event's ending. The demon angel, in contrast, will answer his idea for that same events ending. The winner of the boxing fight will determine the actual ending. Save your people!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
